Text.Page: We can't celebrate forever. Who knows when the scions will come back? We need reinforcements from the federation. But I also think that everyone should know what you've done for Crescentia.
You gained the federation's trust by cleaning up the deva remnants and scions.

This is a report of what happened here.

It also details your heroic contribution.
Now, Velika will be able to track down the dark forces who threaten southern Arun.

Thank you for your service.

It's rare to see Jodoc write about anyone in such glowing terms. You certainly impressed him, .

Deliver this little epistle to Samael. He's as hard to win over as Jodoc, but if anything can do it, it's this report.

Well done, . This is exactly the kind of action we need from all our soldiers right now.

Hmm. Well, this is quite a report. I guess you're not the keener I took you for. I underestimated you. I promise I won't do that in the future.

We need more than just soldiers: We need leaders. Dougal thinks you're ready for a commission. I'm hardly going to argue against it, not after deeds such as these. Come, it's not every day you get to be a hero.
Do you have something to report?

! What took you so long?
Let's start the ceremony.

Take this flying mount.

This may be a little too much...but still.

This will help you on your future missions.

Keep up the good work.
